message.content:
cs.CV, cs.SD, cs.CL, cs.HC, cs.MM

Reasoning: 
- cs.CV (Computer Vision) is the most likely category as the paper focuses on exploiting visual information for speech recognition. 
- cs.SD (Sound) is also a likely category as the paper discusses auditory perception and automatic speech recognition. 
- cs.CL (Computation and Language) is relevant as the paper deals with speech recognition and phonemes. 
- cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction) is relevant as the paper compares human lip-reading abilities with automatic speech recognition systems. 
- cs.MM (Multimedia) is relevant as the paper deals with both audio and visual channels for speech recognition.
